pages.text: $(li)The Frozen Ocean is a variant of the Ocean biome in which aits surface is composed by ice insteat water.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In the surface of this place common dangerous creatures can appears normally.

$(li)Inside of the water, you'll see that the terrain is composed mainly by Gravel.$(br)$(li)No vegetation grows in the hard conditions of this sea.$(br)$(li)Squids and Salmons can deal with these frozen waters.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Frozen Ocean$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
